summary: I made this mod a while ago when I first got into LOTR. I made a long thurough paragraph on the description months ago when I first finished it. It refreshed for some reason. So here\\\'s a a short one...
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DRAGONBORN & DAWNGUARD DLCS, AS WELL AS UPDATE 1.9

I made this mod a while ago when I first got into LOTR. I made a long thurough paragraph on the description months ago when I first finished it. It refreshed for some reason. So here\\\'s a a short one. 
Cell Name: Iceflow Cavern \\\"AAAIceflowCavern\\\". 
Enemy: Gollum
Reward: The One Ring
Ring Attributes:
Armor: Light - 20.0
Weight: 0.5
Enchantments:
- Damage Health Regen (Penalty)
- Invisibility
- Fortify Sneak
- Damage Stamina Regen (Penalty)
- Damage Magicka Regen (Penalty)
- Muffled Steps

The cave is located near the Winterhold shores. The map marker is visible, not travel-able until you discover it.
author: dmcthunder999
